subSections.title: Glyph origin
Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{zh-forms|alt=爪-“to seek”}}
Both “to seek” and “to give change” senses are attested since the Ming dynasty. The etymology is uncertain and it is unclear whether both senses are of the same origin. Compare {{zh-l|爪}} and {{zh-l|抓}}.
